title: The St. Clare's Collection Volume II
description: A fantastic bumper volume of classic stories from a much-loved author. The O’Sullivan twins and their friends are back in this collection recounting their middle years at the famous  boarding school. There are some new arrivals who cause a commotion, but  as tricks are played and hidden talents revealed,  the girls find a way to get along together- or most of them do! This volume collects books  4-6 in the series, Second Form at St. Clare’s, Third Form at St. Clare’s and Kitty at St. Clare’s. Books 5 & 6 are by Pamela Cox.
author: Enid Blyton
